item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, October 21, 2024 at 3:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: Epublifier – scrape pages (books, manuals) for offline reading (91 points | 17 comments)
2. Ioccc Flight Simulator (2010) (44 points | 10 comments)
3. Is It Better to Fail Spectacularly? (43 points | 29 comments)
4. Waking up science's sleeping beauties (2023) (3 points | discuss)
5. Intelsat 33e breaks up in geostationary orbit (66 points | 29 comments)
6. Scientists Started to Decode Birdsong (40 points | 30 comments)
7. Show HN: Erin – Open-source and self-hosted TikTok feed for your own videos (76 points | 28 comments)
8. Egypt declared malaria-free after 100-year effort (54 points | 8 comments)
9. Show HN: HN Update – Hourly news broadcast of top HN stories (495 points | 160 comments)
10. A step toward fully 3D-printed active electronics (147 points | 58 comments)
11. Making Castro’s Feeds Update Faster the Lazy Way (63 points | 15 comments)
12. Jiga (YC W21) Is Hiring FS Engineer (React/Mongo/Node) ( | hide)
13. WebGPU-Based WiFi Simulator (290 points | 76 comments)
14. Do AI detectors work? Students face false cheating accusations (270 points | 585 comments)
15. Plankton balloon to six times size in newly discovered mode of oceanic travel (10 points | 1 comment)
16. Kurt Vonnegut's lost board game published (280 points | 71 comments)
17. Drasi: Microsoft's open source data processing platform for event-driven systems (286 points | 51 comments)
18. Mosaic REALMAP: Explore Prague in detail with 1.26M images (146 points | 33 comments)
19. Sampling with SQL (147 points | 31 comments)
20. C-Motive's electrostatic motors use printed circuit boards instead of magnets (105 points | 43 comments)
21. The Secret History of Mongols: A Digital History Approach (17 points | 3 comments)
22. The Ultimate Conditional Syntax (123 points | 35 comments)
23. MVCC – the part of PostgreSQL we hate the most (2023) (324 points | 105 comments)
24. My free book "Rust Projects – Write a Redis Clone" is out (25 points | 12 comments)
25. The history of the barcode (74 points | 22 comments)
26. Microsoft said it lost weeks of security logs for its customers' cloud products (227 points | 108 comments)
27. The AI Investment Boom (237 points | 314 comments)
28. Janus: Decoupling Visual Encoding for Multimodal Understanding and Generation (17 points | 3 comments)
29. Internet Archive breached again through stolen access tokens (460 points | 293 comments)
30. VPTQ: Extreme low-bit Quantization for real LLMs (12 points | 1 comment)
